statements: DELETE FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND time = '12:00:00'
DELETE FROM ResourceNeeds WHERE resource_type = 'coal' AND quantity < 100
DELETE FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM ResourceNeeds WHERE resource_name = 'solar' AND quantity = 0)
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM ResourceAvailability WHERE resource_type = 'Solar Power';
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM ResourceAvailability WHERE location = 'New York' AND resource_type = 'electricity';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyProduction WHERE location = 'California' AND production < 1000;
DELETE FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month' AND resource_alloc < 500;
